summary: Payment submission succeeded technically, but confirmation page never loaded. User left cart abandoned after 4 retry attempts.
failure_point: Confirmation page load (expected: <3s, actual: timeout after 8s, retried 4x)

signals.description: Payment confirmation page did not load within expected time
User attempted reload 4 times; page never resolved
No navigation forward possible; flow is blocked
User cannot determine if payment was charged

what_this_means: A customer can fill out the checkout form and send payment details, but cannot confirm the purchase succeeded. Payment may or may not have been processed. The customer leaves confused and frustrated. This is a real business failure, not a code bug.
business_impact: Lost transaction, confused customer, potential chargeback
technical_context: Frontend successfully submitted payment to API. API likely processed request successfully. Confirmation page render or API response is stuck or timing out on the frontend.
